summary: On May 4, 2022, Jeff and Julie Hodges discovered a box containing a firearm and other items while clearing vegetation at their home. Investigator Carrie Fitz responded to the scene and collected the items for forensic analysis. The items were submitted to the ABC Forensic Services Laboratory for testing on May 9, 2022.
conclusion: The collected items were submitted for forensic testing to determine any potential evidence related to the found property.

events.details: Julie Hodges discovered a box containing a firearm and other items while digging in her yard.
Investigator Carrie Fitz responded to the call and collected the items found by the Hodges.
The collected items were submitted to the ABC Forensic Services Laboratory for forensic testing.

description: Tattered black in color plastic bag
Black in color metal box with latch with interior containing insulated material and cardboard
Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19 mm caliber (S/N: obliterated) and unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
Seven stray bronze and silver in color 9mm unfired cartridges with Luger headstamp
Small white in color towel with reddish-brown in color stains
Black in color Halloween-type face mask with white in color eye rings
Black in color Halloween-type face mask with purple in color eye rings
